alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 4:42AM MDT until June 27 at 5:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 530 AM MDT. * At 442 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Allen, or 14 miles west of Martin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Allen and Swett around 450 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Martin, LaCreek North Housing and Sunrise Housing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
